Description: Chapitre 001 is the first chapter of the first volume of the Bakemonogatari Manga. It was first published in the Weekly Sh≈çnen Magazine on March 14, 2018 [1].

#Synopsis.text: After a brief talk with Tsubasa Hanekawa and an altercation with Hitagi Senjougahara in front of the classroom about the secret of her body, Koyomi Araragi takes Hitagi to see Meme Oshino at the Eikou Cram School.
